La tecnologia es un instrumento no una realidad alterna.

item.description: Yes! One of the failings of the open data movement was treating data as an inherent good w/out context. item.title: #en @ 1431661855328587782
item.description:
A problem with developing web tools for #SARSCoV2 is that it can be difficult, even with #OpenSource, for others to run your code without special access to databases.
So, we've built a modified version of CoVizu that enables you to run it on ANY data: https://t.co/IbCmET51nJ

item.title: #es @ 1431594580634390529
item.description:
De acuerdo a dataset de datos abiertos, al 24/08, de los 194,738 fallecidos incluidos:
4,351 recibieron 1 dosis (3,943 eran mayores de 60) 1,770 recibieron 2 dosis (1,675 eran mayores de 60)
187,387 no estaban vacunados
No salten a conclusiones, aÃºn mucho por evaluar. https://t.co/p6G4TV9QjY
